Art. 4.88. 
Modalities of the obligation to make a report 
The report is made only to the succession of the donor and is owed only by the co-heir to his co-heir. It is not due to the legatees or creditors of the succession.
Donations which can be carried forward are carried forward in their entirety, even if, after being deducted from the overall reserve, the remainder is deducted from the available 
portion.
Legacies which are subject to reinstatement and which, after being set off against the overall reserve, are for the remainder set off against the available portion, must be reinstated only for the value remaining after their possible reduction.
